backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor for book storage, user profiles, carts, orders, KYC mappings, and admin‑gated catalog export.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for documentation or planning.
frontend/.env.production: Sets VITE_APP_ENV=Live for production builds to display the Live environment badge.
frontend/docs/deployment-preflight.md: Describes required checks before deployment and enforces Version 29 for Live publishes with a separate rollback workflow.
frontend/docs/draft-rebuild-v29.md: Explains how to rebuild Draft Version 29 safely without affecting Live or backend state.
frontend/docs/draft-regression-checks.md: Provides a checklist to prevent catalog‑visibility regressions and ensure error handling before promoting drafts.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v22.md: Outlines the Live smoke test procedure for validating Version 22 deployment, media rendering, and purchase flow.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v29-report: Template for operators to record results of the Version 29 Live smoke test, including environment checks, catalog validation, book details, and purchase flow.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v29.md: Manual checklist outlining all verification steps required to validate Version 29 on the Live environment, covering UI, catalog, purchase flow, and admin functions.
frontend/docs/publish-live.md: Guide describing how to safely publish Version 29 to the Live environment, including strict version lock rules and pre-publish requirements.
frontend/docs/releases/v29-live-publish-: Execution log documenting the Version 29 Live frontend-only deployment, including validations, build steps, and post-deployment checks.
frontend/docs/releases/v29-live-smoke-te: Filled smoke test report template for Version 29 Live validation, containing operator instructions and structured test result fields.
frontend/docs/rollback-to-v35.md: Emergency frontend-only rollback procedure for deploying Version 35 to restore catalog visibility while preserving backend data.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining color tokens for light and dark mode, plus global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint that mounts the app root and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/scripts/deployment-preflight.sh: Runs frontend-only deployment preflight checks including version enforcement, environment validation, dependency verification, and build tests.
frontend/scripts/enforce-version-29.sh: Ensures the frontend VERSION file contains exactly '29' and blocks deployment if not.
frontend/scripts/live-smoke-test-v22-hel: Prints manual smoke‑test checklist and URLs for verifying the Version 22 live deployment.
frontend/scripts/live-smoke-test-v29-hel: Outputs key URLs and manual verification steps for validating the Version 29 live deployment.
frontend/scripts/publish-live.sh: Publishes the Version 29 frontend to Live by enforcing version checks, running preflight, and deploying the frontend canister only.
frontend/scripts/rebuild-draft-v29.sh: Rebuilds the Version 29 frontend in Draft mode by enforcing version, preparing env files, cleaning artifacts, generating bindings, and building.
frontend/scripts/rollback-frontend-v35.s: Automates a frontend‑only rollback to version 35, including version update, rebuild, checks, and canister deployment.
frontend/scripts/rollback-preflight.sh: Runs validation checks before rollback, ensuring VERSION=35 and required files, dependencies, and tools exist.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the application router, theme provider, and global layout for all frontend routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookMediaM: Admin tool for uploading and removing a book’s PDF, images, audio, and video files with progress tracking.
Protects admin pages by checking authentication and admin privileges, showing appropriate warnings and redirects.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with UI feedback and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to enter and save their display name before continuing.
frontend/src/components/books/BookCard.t: Displays a book’s cover, title, metadata, and status badges with links to its details page.
frontend/src/components/books/CoverImage: Displays a book cover image using an uploaded blob if available, with multiple fallback sources on load failure.
frontend/src/components/checkout/KycVeri: Handles KYC document input, validation, backend submission, and success or error UI for restricted purchases.
frontend/src/components/checkout/SelfieC: Empty file with no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable UI component that displays an empty state with optional icon, description, and action.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders site footer with contact links, attribution, version info, and a customer service chat trigger.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Builds the main site header with navigation, auth-aware links, environment badge, balance display, and cart button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Wraps page layout with header, footer, main outlet, and a profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Provides a configurable max‑width container for page content with optional custom classes.
frontend/src/components/library/BookCont: Shows purchased book PDFs and media in a dialog with loading, error handling, previews, and download actions.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Allows downloading a purchased book PDF with permission checks, filename sanitization, and user‑friendly errors.
frontend/src/components/support/Customer: Implements a chat dialog for submitting support messages and viewing threaded responses with authentication-aware behavior.
frontend/src/config/environment.ts: Resolves build-time environment from Vite variables, normalizing to Draft or Live and exporting the result.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecovery.ts: Provides a mutation to recover admin access with user-friendly error mapping and admin state invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Handles user profile fetch/save operations and checks if the caller is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Fetches token balance and provides a mutation to mint tokens, refreshing balance afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: Offers queries and mutations for listing, retrieving, adding, updating, and uploading book data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Manages cart retrieval, item add/remove, checkout, and computes cart totals with book data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalogTransfer.ts: Exports and imports catalog state and invalidates related caches after import.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient with context support.
frontend/src/hooks/useKyc.ts: Submits document-based KYC proofs and updates cart state on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: Builds a user's library from delivered orders and fetches purchased book content or media.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides queries for individual orders, user orders, and all orders through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file; query hooks are defined per feature.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetStore.ts: Provides a mutation to call actor.resetStore and invalidates related React Query caches, with custom error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupportChat.ts: Implements support chat hooks for sending messages, fetching user/admin messages, message responses, and replying, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn() utility that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Admin interface for viewing, adding, editing, and managing books with filters and media/content dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard providing tabbed access to catalog, orders, minting, support, and settings pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMintPage.t: Admin form for minting GLDT tokens to a specified principal with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders in a table, fetching order and book data and showing item details per order.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRecoveryPa: Provides admin access recovery flow using Internet Identity, showing login prompts, success messages, and triggering recovery mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Offers store reset, catalog export, and catalog import tools with file parsing, merge/overwrite modes, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Shows customer support messages grouped into threads and allows admins to reply to messages.
frontend/src/pages/BookDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a selected book with add‑to‑cart logic and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows the user’s cart with book details, handles removal, validates single‑copy issues, and navigates to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Fetches and displays all books with search filtering, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Manages the checkout flow including balance checks, KYC validation, and submitting the order.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing a hero section and a featured books grid using fetched available books.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Displays the user's purchased books with reading and download options, including media badges and content dialog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows confirmation details for a completed order, including purchased items and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseConfirmationP: Generic purchase success screen offering navigation to library, order details, or catalog.
frontend/src/utils/catalogTransfer.ts: Validates, parses, and merges catalog export files, supporting overwrite and merge import modes.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides helpers to download files or JSON data by creating and clicking temporary links.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Includes formatting utilities for token amounts, principals, and timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/kyc.ts: Generates KYC identifiers and validates document numbers with simple rules.
Detects KYC restriction errors and maps them to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/orderId.ts: Generates unique order IDs using timestamps and random numbers.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Parses principal strings into Principal objects and throws on invalid input.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from either storage or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/VERSION: Specifies the current frontend version number (35).
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state including rollback-related requirements, known issues with draft version 36, and pending feature requests for deployment rollback.
